page.title: 08FARMING
page.content: There are 10 farms in our area.In 2 instances 2 farms have been joined to make 1 working unit.At one time all the farms were part of larger estates, the{Greenall,Daresbury and Norton {Estates.}The estates were broken up and sold in{1940's,1950's. Grange Farm 240 acres owned by Man.Ship Canal,farmed by J.T.Carr & son.{Canal {Side Farm}and{Porchhouse Farm,}151ac. farmed by owner Mr.J Priestner.{Moss {Side Farm,}213ac.,farmed by owner Mr. J.Morris.{Hollyhedge}and{Rowswood {Farms,}400ac.,farmed by owners Bennett Bros.{Upper Moss Side Farm,}200ac., farmed by owners Mr.T.&Miss L.Morris.{ {Manor Farm}150ac.,farmed by owners Mrs D.&Mr.P.Mountfield(son).{Rose Farm,} 150 ac.,owned by I.C.I Ltd.farmed by tenant Mr.W.Kitching.{Bellhouse Farm,} 14ac.,farmed by owner Mr.J.Soens.Also used as base for Road Haulage Business
